p: The results showed that the CPFA compositions decreased with an increase in temperature (>150°C). The decomposition of all cyclic acids was relatively higher at the temperature of 200°C in 20 minutes ( Figure 4). The decomposition decreased by about 2-8 percent and 5-15 percent of the original concentration in sterculic and dehydrosterculic fatty acids, respectively. There is a significant difference ( p < 0.05) in sterculic and dehydrosterculic compositions at the three temperatures.
